events.name: u2-intersect.enter
events.description: Fired when the element intersects with the viewport.

events.name: u2-intersect.leave
events.description: Fired when the element leaves the viewport.

attributes.name: u2-intersect
attributes.description: Enables the intersection observer on the element.

cssProperties.name: --u2-intersect-margin
cssProperties.description: The margin around the element that will trigger the intersection observer.

cssProperties.name: --u2-intersect-threshold
cssProperties.description: The threshold at which the intersection observer will trigger.
